ing: 1 fluid ounce orange liqueur (such as CointreauÂ®)
des: "I had my first Pink Cadillac when I was in Las Vegas for my best friend's wedding. This is a refreshing change from a traditional margarita."
ins:
Pour tequila, sweet-and-sour mix, orange liqueur, cranberry juice, and orange juice into a cocktail shaker. Cover and shake vigorously until blended.
Strain over ice into a tall glass or oversized martini glass.
